text: Michael Twittmann (born 23 June 1965) is a German rower. He competed in the men's coxless pair event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:German male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of West Germany Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:People from Kamen
title: Michael Twittmann
